description:
The falketind flex1 Shorts are light weight, stretchable, comfortable and highly durable soft- shell shorts designed for a wide range of outdoor activities. They are made of wind-resistant, breathable, water repelling and recycled soft shell fabric. The above knee cut and athletic fit is customized for mountain related activities, but will serve perfectly for a variety of activities.

Practical features include a sleek custom fit waist system, two slanted hand pockets with zippers, a thigh pocket, a back pocket with zipper, gusset crotch for increased comfort and a sleek hem to avoid chafing and discomfort. An obvious choice for the mountaineering adventurer but also a great choice for the the all-rounder.
name: Norrona Falketind Flex1 Shorts - Mens
